company_name: GEBR. DREES AGRARTECHNIK GMBH & CO. KG
supplier_of: gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment | agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment | livestock raising - machinery and equipment
information: The company GEBR. DREES AGRARTECHNIK GMBH & CO. KG, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1862, which operates in the Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment industry. It also operates in the Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, and Livestock raising - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Greven, Germany.
keywords: Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment, Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, Livestock raising - machinery and equipment
